Html:
Hello PHPExcel friends.

Can anybody help me. I am trying to do the following task:

I have excel file (xlsx). File consists of several worksheets with time-tables. Each worksheet has its name and color (as tab). I need to publish this file on site. Time-tables must be formated like this (example):

-------------------------------------------------------

Andrew (name of 1st worksheet color in red)

Andrew's time-table

Mat (name of 2nd worksheet color in blue)

Mat's time table

and so on.

-------------------------------------------------------

Is there possibility to output also tabs name and color of worksheet using PHPExcel_Writer_HTML (generateHTMLHeader(), generateStyles(), generateSheetData(), generateHTMLFooter() ).

Or what's other better possibility to do my task?

Thanks in advance.
